ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:09 [Issue ID 4000-101124] urn:comicvine:4000-101124 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 04:17:39. [Issue ID 101124]
ComicInfo.Summary: Spawn comes face to face with the "Where's Wanda" murderer, Jason Wynn. After confronting Jason, Spawn reveals that Jason will pay for his crimes and true justice will prevail. Jason pleads with Spawn, asking forgiveness and begging for his life. As things begin to look grim for Jason Wynn, the Clown exposes what his real reasons where for "helping" Wynn all this time. As Spawn watches, Wynn falls to his apparent death, and Spawn believes that this problem has been resolved. What Spawn doesn't know, is that his problems have just begun.
ComicInfo.Title: Pratfall
